subs.text: Just got a copy of Our Own Worst Enemy by @RadioFreeTom ... and I just booked tickets to take my son to visit family in Jerusalem, RI next week. I'll wear shoes on the flight, read the book on the beach, and wave across the water to Tom.

subs.text: @JamesFallows So awesome to see you mentioned @davewiner @jackbaty and @10ch - each has inspired and informed me for years. As have you. Glad to see this newsletter and your return to tools & technology.
subs.rawText: @JamesFallows So awesome to see you mentioned @davewiner @jackbaty and @10ch - each has inspired and informed me for years. As have you. Glad to see this newsletter and your return to tools & technology.

subs.text: @davewiner So glad you wrote about this. I tried to explain this to a friend who asked if I'll stay with Twitter (15 years and counting), and I mentioned how we use it for logging into Drummer.
subs.rawText: @davewiner So glad you wrote about this. I tried to explain this to a friend who asked if I'll stay with Twitter (15 years and counting), and I mentioned how we use it for logging into Drummer.

subs.text: Got my new @stickermule stickers tonight. Over on my Drummer blog, I wrote about the "coconut wireless" icon I used for the design - [link]

subs.text: Thanks to @PiedmontEMC for so quickly resolving our power outage tonight. Linesman Jeff removed the fallen tree from the line, restored power within an hour of my reporting the issue. Glad to be a member of the co-op!
